overview: New Shoes is a narrative short made for the 2021 FLS2N (National Student Art Competition and Festival â€” Short Film Competition), a national art competition organized by Indonesia's Ministry of Education, Culture, Research and Technology. New Shoes won Honorable Mention for Best Cinematography, making it the 4th-highest ranked film in competition out of thousands of submissions from all around Indonesia.
tagline: A short made for FLS2N 2021 Nationals Short Film Competition.
title: New Shoes
